subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Islanders beat the Rangers Monday night for the third time in three games this season, scoring twice in a span of 5 minutes 43 seconds in the second period, then holding on to their lead.
snippet: The Islanders beat the Rangers Monday night for the third time in three games this season, scoring twice in a span of 5 minutes 43 seconds in the second period, then holding on to their lead.
